</h2><blockquote><p>PowerBI默认的格式化字符串的方式为“千”、“百万”与“十亿”，不符合国人使用习惯，今天给大家介绍如何利用计算组结合动态字符串可以修改字符串格式为“万”与“亿“。</p>
</blockquote><p><video src="https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1PN4y1J7MM/"></video></p>
<p>在最新版的PowerBI中已支持计算组与动态字符串设置，如果你发现的的操作界面没有动态字符串功能及模型视图，请至官网下载最新版PowerBI Desktop并在预览功能中打开</p>
<p>度量值的动态格式字符串</p>
<p>模型资源管理器和计算组创作</p>

</h4><p>建立计算组后，会自动建立一个计算项，选中计算项，在“属性”面板中打开动态格式字符串</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571196201-4.png" alt="17246571196201-4.png" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571196201-4.png?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571196201-4.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571196201-4.png?size=large 2x" data-title="17246571196201-4.png" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>将以下代码复制到动态格式窗格中,并设置一个合适的计算项名称(比如“格式化字符串”)</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-dax" data-lang="dax"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nf">VAR</span><span class="w"> </span>CurrentValue = abs(SELECTEDMEASURE())
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nf">RETURN</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="n">SWITCH</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">TRUE</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>CurrentValue &lt; 1E4, &#34;#,0&#34; ,
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>CurrentValue &lt;= 1E8, &#34;.&#39;&#34; 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nf">FORMAT</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="w"> </span>CurrentValue/1E4, &#34;0.00 万&#34; ),
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>CurrentValue &lt;= 1E80,&#34;.&#39;&#34; 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nf">FORMAT</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="w"> </span>CurrentValue/1E8, &#34;0.00 亿&#34; ),
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nf">SELECTEDMEASUREFORMATSTRING</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="p">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h4 id="运用计算组" class="heading-element"><span>运用计算组</span>

 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>选中你想格式化字符串的视觉对象，将“计算列”拖至筛选面板的“此视觉对象上的筛选器”，选中刚刚构建的计算项“格式化字符串”，表格中的数值就切换成以“万”和“亿”为单位的显示格式了。</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571206191-5.png" alt="17246571206191-5.png" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571206191-5.png?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571206191-5.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571206191-5.png?size=large 2x" data-title="17246571206191-5.png" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>

 <a href="#%e6%80%9d%e8%80%83" class="heading-mark">

</h3><p>更进一步，如果再一个表格中有多个度量值，我们只想要其中一部分度量值的单位修改为“万”，另一部分保持在PowerBI中设置度量值格式，改怎么处理呢？</p>
<p>修改计算项中的动态格式字符串表达式如下内容即可，以下表达式指定了只对”交易金额”,“订单数”,“交易用户数”这三个度量值生效动态格式字符串，大家可以根据实际需求修改为自己需要的内容</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-dax" data-lang="dax"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nf">VAR</span><span class="w"> </span>CurrentValue = abs(SELECTEDMEASURE())
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="nf">VAR</span><span class="w"> </span>__custFormat = SWITCH (
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">TRUE</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>CurrentValue &lt; 1E4, &#34;#,0&#34; ,
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>CurrentValue &lt;= 1E8, &#34;.&#39;&#34; 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nf">FORMAT</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="w"> </span>CurrentValue/1E4, &#34;0.00 万&#34; ),
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>CurrentValue &lt;= 1E80,&#34;.&#39;&#34; 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nf">FORMAT</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="w"> </span>CurrentValue/1E8, &#34;0.00 亿&#34; ),
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nf">SELECTEDMEASUREFORMATSTRING</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="nf">RETURN</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="n">IF</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nf">SELECTEDMEASURENAME</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="err">in</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s">&#34;交易金额&#34;</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="s">&#34;订单数&#34;</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="s">&#34;交易用户数&#34;</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="err">__custFormat</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="nf">SELECTEDMEASUREFORMATSTRING</span><span class="p">())</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>

</div><h2 id="方法二" class="heading-element"><span>方法二：</span>
 <a href="#%e6%96%b9%e6%b3%95%e4%ba%8c" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="1第一步bi中新建单位表" class="heading-element"><span>1：第一步，BI中新建单位表</span>
 <a href="#1%e7%ac%ac%e4%b8%80%e6%ad%a5bi%e4%b8%ad%e6%96%b0%e5%bb%ba%e5%8d%95%e4%bd%8d%e8%a1%a8" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571226192-1.png" alt="17246571226192-1.png" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571226192-1.png?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571226192-1.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571226192-1.png?size=large 2x" data-title="17246571226192-1.png" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>这是dax代码</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-dax" data-lang="dax"><span class="line"><span class="cl">单位 =
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nf">SELECTCOLUMNS</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s">&#34;元&#34;</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="m">1</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;万&#34;</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="m">10000</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;千万元&#34;</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="m">10000000</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;亿元&#34;</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="m">100000000</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s">&#34;单位&#34;</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="na">[Value1]</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s">&#34;单位值&#34;</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="na">[Value2]</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>建表后</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571236182-2.png" alt="17246571236182-2.png" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571236182-2.png?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571236182-2.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571236182-2.png?size=large 2x" data-title="17246571236182-2.png" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<h3 id="2第二步准备度量值" class="heading-element"><span>2：第二步，准备度量值</span>
 <a href="#2%e7%ac%ac%e4%ba%8c%e6%ad%a5%e5%87%86%e5%a4%87%e5%ba%a6%e9%87%8f%e5%80%bc" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>我们假设现在要计算一个流量_曝光人数的求和</p>
<blockquote><p>流量_曝光人数 = CALCULATE(SUM(&lsquo;流量数据&rsquo;[曝光人数]))</p>
</blockquote><p>然后新建一个度量值用于测试，这里使用了SELECTEDVALUE函数，会去获取当前的筛选条件，我们利用了这个函数特性，例如我筛选器选择&quot;万&quot;,那么这个函数会返回10000，配合这个除法公式，就会在原有的值上去除10000。</p>
<blockquote><p>流量_曝光人数_测试 = [流量_曝光人数] / SELECTEDVALUE ( &lsquo;单位&rsquo;[单位值], 1 )</p>
</blockquote><p>假设我们现在有一个值是&quot;230000&quot;，那么现在我们得到的值应该就是&quot;23&quot;，按照我们之前的预期，我们想要的到的是&quot;23万&quot;，离目标还差一个单位值的拼接。</p>
<p>点选度量值以后，先设置度量值格式为动态格式</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571246182-3.png" alt="17246571246182-3.png" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571246182-3.png?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571246182-3.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571246182-3.png?size=large 2x" data-title="17246571246182-3.png" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>然后进入度量值格式设置</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571256172-4.png" alt="17246571256172-4.png" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571256172-4.png?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571256172-4.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571256172-4.png?size=large 2x" data-title="17246571256172-4.png" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>在格式栏，设置以下参数，这里的代码意思是，这个度量值保留一位小数，并且用连接符号&quot;&amp;&ldquo;拼接单位这张表里的单位名称，我们在上一步已经得到了&quot;23&quot;如果再拼接上，目前被选择的&quot;万&rdquo;，是不是就能得到&quot;23万&quot;了呢?</p>
<blockquote><p>&ldquo;0.0&rdquo;&amp;SELECTEDVALUE ( &lsquo;单位&rsquo;[单位] )</p>
</blockquote><h3 id="第三步验证和测试" class="heading-element"><span>第三步：验证和测试</span>
 <a href="#%e7%ac%ac%e4%b8%89%e6%ad%a5%e9%aa%8c%e8%af%81%e5%92%8c%e6%b5%8b%e8%af%95" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>我们新建一个卡片图，</p>
<p>将单位拉入我们的卡片图筛选器，勾选单选，并勾选&quot;万&quot;</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571266182-5.png" alt="17246571266182-5.png" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571266182-5.png?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571266182-5.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571266182-5.png?size=large 2x" data-title="17246571266182-5.png" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571126202-6.png" alt="17246571126202-6.png" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571126202-6.png?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571126202-6.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571126202-6.png?size=large 2x" data-title="17246571126202-6.png" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>看一下最后效果，已经是我们的预期了，同样的道理，也适用与表格或者其他形式的视觉对象</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571146252-7.png" alt="17246571146252-7.png" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571146252-7.png?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571146252-7.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571146252-7.png?size=large 2x" data-title="17246571146252-7.png" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>并且我们可以通过切换切片器的单位，去切换我们的展示单位。如下面我们切换到&quot;亿元&quot;，其他的单位都是支持的。</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571156182-8.png" alt="17246571156182-8.png" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571156182-8.png?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571156182-8.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_dynamicformat/17246571156182-8.png?size=large 2x" data-title="17246571156182-8.png" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>

item.title: PowerBI柱状图完成差异对比
item.description:
<p>在PowerBI里面，默认自带的原生视觉对象，是可以自由设置功能最丰富了。比如今天要演示的柱状图，就可以通过对视觉对象误差线的设置，来实现同比变化值突出显示的效果。不仅可以标记变化长度，还能够使用颜色标记增长为绿色，下降为红色，同时标记出增长变化率。这些都是在同一个视觉对象上完成的，效果如下↓</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574303051.gif" alt="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574303051.gif" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574303051.gif?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574303051.gif?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574303051.gif?size=large 2x" data-title="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574303051.gif" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>这种可视化方式最常用的就是同期对比，或者是和目标值的对比。我们这里就使用两种常用的方法来进行制作演示，了解了思路后，可以根据实际情况做出更多的效果。</p>
<h2 id="同比变化演示" class="heading-element"><span>【同比变化演示】</span>
 <a href="#%e5%90%8c%e6%af%94%e5%8f%98%e5%8c%96%e6%bc%94%e7%a4%ba" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>首先是同比变化情况，我们的数据是2023和2024两年产品每月的销售金额，要在图形上直观的展示2024年对比2023年的增长变化情况，首先准备数据，格式很简单，就是每月每个产品的销售金额，如下↓</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574323152.webp" alt="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574323152.webp" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574323152.webp?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574323152.webp?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574323152.webp?size=large 2x" data-title="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574323152.webp" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>然后把数据导入到PowerBI里面，先创建两个最基本的度量值，销售金额和上年同期的销售金额，并计算出金额的差值↓</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-dax" data-lang="dax"><span class="line"><span class="cl">销售金额 = SUM([GMV])
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">上年销售金额 = 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nf">CALCULATE</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="na">[销售金额]</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nf">DATEADD</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="na">&#39;_date&#39;[Date]</span><span class="o">,-</span><span class="m">1</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="nf">YEAR</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="err">同比差值</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="na">[销售金额]</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">-</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="na">[上年销售金额]</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574343043.webp" alt="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574343043.webp" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574343043.webp?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574343043.webp?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574343043.webp?size=large 2x" data-title="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574343043.webp" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>这三个字段计算好了之后，就可以在PowerBI里面进行可视化操作了，使用的视觉对象是默认的簇状柱形图，演示一下过程↓</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574123064.gif" alt="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574123064.gif" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574123064.gif?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574123064.gif?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574123064.gif?size=large 2x" data-title="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574123064.gif" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>然后简单设置一下本年和上年的颜色。上一年设置成白色，黑色边框填充；今年的值设置成黑色，黑色边框填充↓</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574153055.gif" alt="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574153055.gif" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574153055.gif?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574153055.gif?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574153055.gif?size=large 2x" data-title="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574153055.gif" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>然后再设置一下布局效果，把重叠打开，设置一下类别间距和系列间距，两个柱状图就有了一定的融合效果，就基本上有了我们需要的效果了↓</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574180136.gif" alt="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574180136.gif" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574180136.gif?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574180136.gif?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574180136.gif?size=large 2x" data-title="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574180136.gif" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>接下来新建两个度量值，用来分别展示比上期高和比上期低的值↓</p>

</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-dax" data-lang="dax"><span class="line"><span class="cl">同比增长 = IF([同比差值] &gt; 0,[最大值])
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">同比下降 = IF([同比差值] &lt; 0,[最大值])
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="err">把度量值分别放入更多设置的误差项里面。需要设置一下颜色，宽度根据实际情况设置，并且把边框颜色设置为0。</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574200087.gif" alt="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574200087.gif" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574200087.gif?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574200087.gif?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574200087.gif?size=large 2x" data-title="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574200087.gif" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>

<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-dax" data-lang="dax"><span class="line"><span class="cl">color差值 = 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">IF</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="na">[销售金额]</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="na">[上年销售金额]</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="s">&#34;#32a11b&#34;</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="s">&#34;#c90032&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574223058.webp" alt="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574223058.webp" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574223058.webp?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574223058.webp?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574223058.webp?size=large 2x" data-title="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574223058.webp" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>如果不想展示差异的绝对值，也可以使用变化百分比来进行性展示，度量值和效果如下↓</p>
<p>同比百分比 = DIVIDE([销售金额] - [上年销售金额],[上年销售金额])</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574233059.webp" alt="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574233059.webp" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574233059.webp?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574233059.webp?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574233059.webp?size=large 2x" data-title="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/17246574233059.webp" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<h2 id="目标完成率演示" class="heading-element"><span>【目标完成率演示】</span>
 <a href="#%e7%9b%ae%e6%a0%87%e5%ae%8c%e6%88%90%e7%8e%87%e6%bc%94%e7%a4%ba" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>目标完成率思路是完全一样的，只是对比的内容是目标值。数据字段如下，多了一列目标值，其他都是一样的↓</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/172465742431910.webp" alt="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/172465742431910.webp" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/172465742431910.webp?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/172465742431910.webp?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/172465742431910.webp?size=large 2x" data-title="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/172465742431910.webp" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>导入PowerBI，然后使用日期维度表建立关系↓</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/172465742530511.webp" alt="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/172465742530511.webp" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/172465742530511.webp?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/172465742530511.webp?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/172465742530511.webp?size=large 2x" data-title="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/172465742530511.webp" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>下面按照同样的思路，进行度量值的建立和绘图↓</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span><span class="lnt">9
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-dax" data-lang="dax"><span class="line"><span class="cl">_销售金额 = SUM([GMV])
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">_目标 = SUM([GMV目标])
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">_差值 = [_销售金额]-[_目标]
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">_最大值 = MAX([_目标],[_销售金额])
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">_目标完成 = IF([_销售金额] &gt; 0,[_最大值])
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">_目标未完成 = IF([_销售金额] &lt; 0,[_最大值])
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">_color差值 = 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">IF</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="na">[_销售金额]</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="na">[_目标]</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="s">&#34;#32a11b&#34;</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="s">&#34;#c90032&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><img loading="lazy" src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/172465742630412.webp" alt="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/172465742630412.webp" srcset="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/172465742630412.webp?size=small, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/172465742630412.webp?size=medium 1.5x, https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/172465742630412.webp?size=large 2x" data-title="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/richbridge/imgbed@main/powerbi/PBI_histogram_completes_the_difference_comparison/172465742630412.webp" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>也可以按照目标完成率来进行展示↓</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-dax" data-lang="dax"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="err">完成率</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nf">DIVIDE</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="na">[_销售金额]</span><span class="o">,</span><span class="na">[_目标]</span><span class="p">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
